bibl.title: Posidippus on Papyri Then and Now.
Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309)
bibl.author: OBBINK, Dirk

bibl.note: P. Mil. Vogl. VIII, 309. - Contextualizes the new epigrams of Posidippus.
OBBINK Dirk, Posidippus on Papyri Then and Now.

Benjamin ACOSTA-HUGHES, Elizabeth KOSMETATOU and Manuel BAUMBACH (Edd.), Labored in Papyrus Leaves: Perspectives on an Epigram Collection Attributed to Posidippus (P. Mil. Vogl. VIII 309) = Hellenic Studies. 2 (Washington, D.C. - Cambridge, Mass. - London, 2004) pp. 16-28.
